title: Berry Smoothie from Carnation Breakfast Essentials
directions: Place juice, Carnation Breakfast Essentials Drink, berries and ice in blender; cover. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 packet Strawberry Sensation Flavor CARNATION BREAKFAST ESSENTIALS Complete Nutritional Drink
1/2 cup frozen berries (strawberries, raspberries and/or blueberries)
